alert.note: Alert for Custer Co Plains; Hermosa Foot Hills; Rapid City (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 23 at 12:36PM MDT until April 24 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...The Rapid City area, the Custer County Plains and the Hermosa Foot Hills. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.

area.areaDesc: Custer Co Plains; Hermosa Foot Hills; Rapid City
